channel.title: Comments on: The great geek escape

item.title: By: Antoine Leboyer
item.dc:creator: Antoine Leboyer
item.description: <p>This really was tough. For solidarity, http://www.gsx.net/blog/?p=430</p>
item.content:encoded: This really was tough. For solidarity, http://www.gsx.net/blog/?p=430

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@vowe, in theory I'm flying to Belfast in 10 days time, but we'll see if things have recovered by then!</p><p>@Steve, yes it will certainly make for some interesting memories!</p>
item.content:encoded:
@vowe, in theory I’m flying to Belfast in 10 days time, but we’ll see if things have recovered by then!

@Steve, yes it will certainly make for some interesting memories!

item.title: By: Steve Castledine
item.dc:creator: Steve Castledine
item.description: <p>Good luck and safe journey, and once you are home I'm sure you will look back and think what a great adventure!</p>
item.content:encoded: Good luck and safe journey, and once you are home I’m sure you will look back and think what a great adventure!

item.title: By: Volker Weber
item.dc:creator: Volker Weber
item.description: <p>Amazing journey, my friend. Tripit says your next gig is only 10 days away.</p>
item.content:encoded: Amazing journey, my friend. Tripit says your next gig is only 10 days away.
